attributes.additional_details:
In these times of RESTRAINT, renegotiated Public Service Workers Pensions, reduced salary expectations along with stopping Final Salary Pension Schemes and salary restraint in the Private Sector, isn't it time MP's took their own medicine.
After all it was Parliament that sleep walked us into this mess!

We the undersigned call upon MP's to match the Reduced salaries and pensions being imposed on the Civil Service,
